mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CODEGRP FROM SYS990020 WHERE USINGMENU in (0, #{usingmenu}) AND COMMONFLAG = #{commonflag}

SELECT A.CODENO,A.CODEGRP,A.CODENAME,A.CODEVAL ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE ,FN_GETCODE('ISDELETE',A.ISDELETE,1) AS ISDELETE_ ,A.ISDELETE ,A.UPPERCODEGRP ,B.CODENAME AS UPPERCODEGRP_ ,B.CODEVAL AS UPPERCODEGRP ,(SELECT LICENSENAME FROM MA900020 WHERE LICENSENO = A.USINGMENU) AS USINGMENU FROM sys990020 A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys990020 B ON B.CODENO = A.UPPERCODEGRP WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.CODENO = #{codeno}
